content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [yourname] No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [yourname] The final price proposed by Peter Schmidt was 650 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [yourname] I am not satisfied with the outcome, so I would rate it as 0 on a scale from 1 to 10.
name: Max Müller
